是否在建立连接后自动登录，默认 true.en: Whether to automatically log in after the connection is established, the default is true

使用 Python Parser 来解释执行脚本, 默认 false.en: Use Python Parser to interpret and execute scripts, the default is false

数据库连接地址 (WebSocket URL), 如: ws://127.0.0.en: Database connection URL (WebSocket URL), e.g. ws://127.0.0.1:8848, wss://dolphindb.com (HTTPS encrypted)

{{message}};\n无法通过 WebSocket 连接到 {{url}}.en:
{{message}};
Unable to connect to {{url}} through WebSocket, please check the url, DataSource configuration, network connection status (whether proxy is configured, whether the proxy supports WebSocket), whether the server is started, and the server version is not lower than 1.30.16 or 2.00.4

Query 的返回值不是标量、向量或只含一个向量的表格.en: Query return value is not a scalar, a vector, or a table containing only one vector

通过执行脚本生成变量选项，脚本的最后一条语句应返回标量、向量、或者只含一个向量的.en: Generate variable options by executing the script, the last statement of the script should return a scalar, a vector, or a table containing only one vector

暂存查询并更新预览.en: Stage the query and update the preview

Query 代码的最后一条语句需要返回 table，实际返回的是: {{valu.en: The last statement of the Query code needs to return a table, the actual return is: {{value}}
